title: OCE - NZ - ADC - LOOKING FOR TEAM/CLAN
body:
Ayooooo, I'm Blackie, I'm just a usual NZ person, kick back asf stoner, I've been playing LoL for the past 2 years on and off, and I've came back to play, I'm not the best player around which is obvious but I'm a good team player and use skype and TS, just looking for a team to kick it with, sick of being a solo person, anyone or anything I'll be keen for, feel free to ask me anything - Blackie101
About me: I'm 17, live in NZ, I'm a kick back person, I just like to blaze up and play league and listen to music.

replies.body: Add me I'm new to the game but have played wow for 6 years. I'm a kiwi dad 42 years old. Thanks
add me man im livin in aus, im 17, I like to listen to music too and im not the worst player so ^_^ yeah have fun :)

hey, I am similar to you, 16 and in Aus. I also use TS and Skype when playing i don't take the game insanely serious and like to have a laugh and just to chill out and pass the time. Add me if you want and we can play games in the future. (on Most of the time). I play with 2-3 other people and we could use a really good adc( FYI they are not the best players in OCE)
